TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GenericWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart

summary.span: Wraps server controls that are not controls so that they can appear and behave as true controls at run time.

span.span: Wraps server controls that are not controls so that they can appear and behave as true controls at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存在控件为服务器控件不提供的运行时包装控制，以便可以在 Web 部件页及应用程序中使用此类控件。The control exists to provide a run-time wrapper for server controls that are not controls, so that such controls can be used in Web Parts pages and applications. 当开发人员添加服务器控件-如用户控件、 ASP.NET 服务器控件或现有的自定义控件-控件，控件自动换行的服务器控件在运行时使它们可能会表现出相同为 true，则功能控件。When developers add server controls--such as user controls, ASP.NET server controls, or existing custom controls--to a control, the control automatically wraps the server controls at run time so they can exhibit the same functionality as true controls. 下表比较和对照控件和控件。The following table compares and contrasts controls and controls. | 控件 control| 控件 control| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |存在，无法为服务器控件不控件，通过 Web 部件功能，因此该任何 ASP.NET，在 Web 部件应用程序可以参与自定义或用户控件。Exists to equip server controls that are not controls with Web Parts functionality, so that any ASP.NET, custom, or user control can participate in Web Parts applications.|存在是为了创建具有本机内置的 Web 部件功能的自定义 ASP.NET 控件。Exists to create custom ASP.NET controls that have native Web Parts functionality built in. 这包括个性化、 连接、 导入和导出和拖放功能。This includes personalization, connections, import and export, and drag-and-drop capabilities.| |永远不会在页面的标记中声明。Is never declared in the markup of a page. 仅在运行时，包装服务器控件并为包装的控件 （或子控件） 提供的完整功能存在控件。It exists only to wrap server controls at run time, and to give the wrapped control (or child control) the full functionality of a control.|可以声明中的页面的标记在设计时，如 ASP.NET 服务器控件，只不过在中声明区域。Can be declared in the markup of a page at design time, like an ASP.NET server control, except that it is declared in a zone.| |包括并将其子控件集成到 Web 部件个性化处理，以便它可以充当真正控件。Includes and integrates its child control into the Web Parts personalization process so that it can act as a true control. 此自动发生，这可使开发人员能够使用 Web 部件应用程序中的服务器控件和用户控件更加简单。This occurs automatically, which makes it simple for developers to use server controls and user controls in Web Parts applications.|将自动包含在 Web 部件个性化过程。Is automatically included in the Web Parts personalization process.| |可以在运行时以编程方式访问 (通过使用方法并传递给它的子服务器控件)，类似于真正控件或标准的 ASP.NET 控件。Can be accessed programmatically at run time (by using the method and passing to it the child server control), like a true control or a standard ASP.NET control.|可以访问以编程方式在运行时，与标准的 ASP.NET 控件一样。Can be accessed programmatically at run time, like a standard ASP.NET control.| 用户得益于控制，因为它提供了一致的用户体验。Users benefit from the control because it provides a consistent user experience. 所有服务器控件可以都进行功能上相当于控件，然后将具有的相同的一致的用户界面 (UI) 元素，例如谓词、 图标、 标题和标头。Any server control can be made to function like a control, and will have the same consistent user interface (UI) elements such as verbs, icons, a title, and a header. 开发人员受益于控制，因为它将使它们能够重复使用现有的用户控件和 Web 部件应用程序中的服务器控件。Developers benefit from the control because it enables them to reuse existing user controls and server controls within Web Parts applications. > [!NOTE] > 当创建 Web 部件页时，则不需要执行任何操作即可启用现有的用户控件或自定义控件进行包装控件。When you create Web Parts pages, you do not have to do anything to enable an existing user control or custom control to be wrapped with the control. 只需将添加到服务器或用户控件区域，以编程方式或通过声明中页面的标记，并自动设置的 Web 部件控件将包装您的控件与在运行时的对象。Simply add your server or user control to a zone, either programmatically or by declaring it in the page's markup, and the Web Parts control set automatically wraps your control with a object at run time. 因为服务器控件，都将置于区域进行包装控件在运行时，开发人员可以使用普通的服务器和用户控件完全就像它们是控件。Because server controls that are placed in zones are wrapped with a control at run time, developers can use ordinary server and user controls exactly as if they were controls. 请注意，如果你声明自定义控件，继承自基类类内，这些控件无法支持的内部函数使用属性。Note that, if you declare custom controls that inherit from the base class within a , these controls cannot support the use of the intrinsic properties. 因此，您無法宣告属性对此类控件，其中包括属性，例如属性和属性。Thus, you cannot declare the properties on such controls, including properties such as the property and the property. 与此相反，其他类型的服务器控件 (如控件、 用户控件和继承的自定义控件) 可以声明这些属性，因为它们支持 expando 属性的使用。In contrast, other types of server controls (such as controls, user controls, and custom controls that inherit from ) can declare these properties, because they support the use of expando properties. Expando 属性是实际的字符串，可以添加到类动态作为属性，通过接口。Expando properties are actually strings that can be added to a class dynamically as a property, by means of the interface. 这些控件可实现此接口，包括类及其子级，可以使用 expando 属性。Controls that implement this interface, including the class and its children, can use expando properties. 因为基类不支持 expando 属性，继承自的自定义控件时类放置在和使用已包装控件在运行时，Web 部件控件集不能内部函数中动态添加到自定义控件的属性。Because the base class does not support expando properties, when a custom control that inherits from the class is placed in a and wrapped with a control at run time, the Web Parts control set cannot dynamically add the intrinsic properties to the custom control. 在这种情况下有两种选择。You have two choices in this case. 你可以使用自定义控件，而无需属性，也可以实现在自定义控件中，使其可以使用属性的接口。You can use the custom control without the properties, or you can implement the interface in the custom control, enabling it to use the properties. 作为举例说明如何控件继承可以使用属性，如果你声明一个 ASP.NET页面的标记中的控件 (在区域) 在设计时，即使此控件不会继承从类，并且不以本机方式包含成员，你可以仍将其完全相同控件。As an example of how controls that inherit from can use the properties, if you declare an ASP.NET control in the markup of a page (within a zone) at design time, even though this control does not inherit from the class and does not natively contain members, you can still treat it exactly like a control. 你可以声明在日历上的属性控制，如， ，和其他人。You can declare properties on the calendar control, such as , , and others. 在运行时，可以使用方法，它返回控件，可动态包装日历控件中，并使用它以编程方式就像与控制，有权访问所有相同属性、 事件和方法。At run time, you can use the method, which returns the control that is dynamically wrapping the calendar control, and work with it programmatically exactly as you would with a control, with access to all the same properties, events, and methods. 控件具有使您可以访问其基础的服务器控件的关键属性：属性。The control has a critical property that allows you to access its underlying server control: the property. 此属性允许开发人员能够以编程方式访问服务器控件。This property allows developers to programmatically access the server control. 还使用属性控件以从子控件，访问个性化数据以及执行授权，如果属性设置。The property is also used by the control to access personalization data from the child control, and to perform authorization, if the property is set. 控件具有多个其他属性，所有这些重写继承自基类的属性类。The control has several other properties, all of which override properties inherited from the base class. 如前所述，你可以使用这些属性与任何子控件，以便它可以充当控件。As noted, you can use these properties with any child control, so that it can behave as a control. 一个重要的属性是属性; 它将确定是否可导出的所有属性，或只有标记为非敏感，可以导出。One important property is the property; it determines whether all the exportable properties, or only those marked as non-sensitive, can be exported. 面向用户界面的属性继承自类，如， ， ， ， ，和，可以是任何服务器控件的声明性标记中设置置于区域。The UI-oriented properties inherited from the class, such as , , , , , and , can be set in the declarative markup for any server control that is placed in a zone. 中的重要方法类包括方法，创建与关联的控件 （包括子控件） 的集合控件，与方法，该委托到的所有呈现方法已包装的子控件。Important methods in the class include the method, which creates the collection of controls (including child controls) associated with a control, and the method, which delegates all rendering to the wrapped child controls. 在构造函数类保护，并且旨在供内部使用或用于扩展性方案。The constructors on the class are protected and are intended either for internal use or for extensibility scenarios. 有用于处理一些其他有用见解控件。There are some additional helpful insights for working with controls. 如果你想要设置中的重写属性的默认值类，你的用户控件或自定义服务器控件可以实现和接口，并重写其成员。If you want to set default values for the overridden properties in the class, your user control or custom server control can implement the and interfaces, and override their members. 在运行时，控件将获取子控件实现接口的实现的属性及其值。At run time, the control will get its values for the implemented properties from the child control that implements the interfaces. 如果您的控件定义的任何属性作为可个性化 (通过使用`Personalizable`元数据属性)，则控件自动使这些属性在运行时，可个性化属性一样的个性化上控件。If your control defines any of its properties as personalizable (by using the `Personalizable` metadata attribute), the control automatically enables those properties for personalization at run time, just like the personalizable properties on a control. 如果你想要为您的控件提供 Web 部件的编辑功能，你可以实施接口。If you want to provide Web Parts editing features for your control, you can implement the interface. 在运行时，当调用方法时，控件的代码属性将调入相同的属性在子控件中，并使用子控件的实现来创建关联的自定义控件。At run time, when the method is called, the control's code for the property will call into the same property in the child control, and use the child control's implementation to create associated custom controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何控件自动换行不是一个服务器控件控件在运行时。The following code example demonstrates how the control automatically wraps a server control that is not a control at run time. 下面的代码示例的第一部分包含 Web 部件页包含两个控件。The first part of the code example contains a Web Parts page with two controls. 每个区域内是一个标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件。Within each zone is a standard ASP.NET server control. 因为这些控件位于区域，它们将自动换行与控制当编译页。Because the controls are in a zone, they will be automatically wrapped with a control when the page is compiled. 因此，你可以声明类上这些控件的属性。So, you can declare class properties on these controls. 如果您单击加载在浏览器中，页后**显示所有属性值**按钮，详细信息的每个控件显示在标签。After you load the page in a browser, if you click the **Display All Property Values** button, the details for each control are displayed in a label. 若要显示如何控件的工作原理，第一个区域中的控件具有某些.aspx 页面中，声明性标记中设置属性而控件不。To show how the control works, the control in the first zone has some of the properties set in the declarative markup of the .aspx page, whereas the control does not. 加载页面后，请注意这两个控件的属性值中的差异，并且两者都父控件。After you load the page, note the differences in the property values for the two controls, and that both have a parent control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分显示的分部类的访问的某些属性以编程方式控制。The second part of the code example shows a partial class that accesses some properties of the control programmatically. 请注意，在`Page_Load`方法，方法用于检索的运行时实例包装服务器控件的控件。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the method is used to retrieve the run-time instance of the control that wraps a server control. 此方法获取对父级的引用的控件使您能够以编程方式与普通的服务器或用户控件，就好像控件在运行时。This approach of getting a reference to the parent control enables you to work programmatically with an ordinary server or user control as if it were a control at run time. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#3)]

span.para: 有几个情况下有必要继承类。一个此类情况下将为开发人员想要实现的构造函数中的某些自定义操作时创建控件。例如，你可能想要存储之外控件集合中的某个位置的子控件类。如果从继承类，你还需要从继承类并重写其方法，以使其能够创建自定义控件。

There are few occasions where it is necessary to inherit from the class. One such case would be if a developer wants to implement some custom action in the constructor when a control is created. For example, you might want to store the child control somewhere other than the control collection within the class. If you inherit from the class, you also need to inherit from the class and override its method to enable it to create your custom control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数由调用控制在其方法，以初始化的实例通过传入对子服务器控件的引用的控件。The constructor is called by the control in its method, to initialize an instance of a control by passing in a reference to a child server control. 后创建对象，你可以引用子控件使用属性。After the object is created, you can reference the child control using the property.

summary.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that represents a control in a catalog of controls.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that represents a control in a catalog of controls.

value.span: 表示用于表示目录中的控件的图像的 URL 的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image used to represent the control in a catalog.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件应用程序通常提供的用户可以添加到页面的控件的一个目录 （或列表）。Web Parts applications often provide a catalog (or list) of controls that users can add to a page. 控件上的属性包含对出现在目录中表示的控件的图像的 URL。The property on a control contains the URL to an image that represents the control when it appears in a catalog. 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何属性中的服务器控件以声明方式设置控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分演示了当用户单击时以编程方式访问属性的值的方法**显示所有属性值**按钮。The second part of the code example demonstrates the method that programmatically accesses the value of the property when a user clicks the **Display All Property Values** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: Gets a reference to the child control that is wrapped by a control at run time.

span.span: Gets a reference to the child control that is wrapped by a control at run time.
A that refers to the wrapped child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种能够访问子控件由包装控件。The property provides the means to access the child control wrapped by a control. 例如，控件使用属性以从子控件提取个性化数据。For example, the control uses the property to extract personalization data from the child control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 属性以编程方式访问，以检索的子控件有关的信息控件。The property is accessed programmatically to retrieve information about the child control of a control. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

span.span: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.

summary.span: Overrides the base method to create a read-only collection that consists of the child control wrapped by a control.

span.span: Overrides the base method to create a read-only collection that consists of the child control wrapped by a control.

returns.span: A that contains the child control.

span.span: A that contains the child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建的私有只读集合，其中包含的子控件的单个控件的控件。The method creates a private, read-only collection that consists of a single control, which is the child control of a control. 此集合在创建，以便开发人员不能手动添加到其他控件控件。This collection is created so that developers cannot manually add other controls to a control. 如果你想要创建自定义控件而不向专用集合添加的子控件，您可以从其中类，请替代构造函数，并提供用于存储子控件的不同方法所引用的属性。If you want to create a custom control without adding the child control to the private collection, you can derive from the class, override the constructor, and provide a different method for storing the child control referenced by the property.

summary.span: Returns a collection of custom controls that can be used to edit the child control of a control when it is in edit mode.

span.span: Returns a collection of custom controls that can be used to edit the child control of a control when it is in edit mode.

returns.span: An that contains custom controls associated with a server control.

span.span: An that contains custom controls associated with a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件进入编辑显示模式时调用方法。The method is called when a control enters edit display mode. 此方法重写继承自基方法类，因为的情况下控件，它是正在编辑，未子控件控件本身。This method overrides the base method inherited from the class because, in the case of a control, it is the child control that is being edited, not the control itself. 方法将强制转换到的子控件接口，使控件能够对其进行编辑。The method casts the child control to the interface, which enables the control to be edited. 此重写的方法是一种使不派生自的服务器控件类-包括 ASP.NET 服务器控件和自定义服务器控件-要编辑作为普通控件。This overridden method is what enables server controls that do not derive from the class--including ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls--to be edited as normal controls.

summary.span: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what a control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of server controls.

span.span: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what a control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of server controls.

value.span: 一个字符串，简要总结了控件的功能。

span.span: A string that briefly summarizes the control's functionality.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值通常用于为提供的服务器控件的列表的目录中的控件的描述性字符串，并为工具提示控件的标题栏中。The property value is typically used as a descriptive string for a control in catalogs that provide lists of server controls, and as a ToolTip in a control's title bar. 当用户将鼠标指针定位控件的标题栏中的标题文本上时，对属性的内容将显示在工具提示。The content of the property appears in a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title text in a control's title bar. 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何属性中的服务器控件以声明方式设置控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式在标签中显示其值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

.property instance string Subtitle
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Subtitle As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Subtitle { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Subtitle : string

summary.span: Gets a string that is concatenated with the property value to form a complete title for a control.

span.span: Gets a string that is concatenated with the property value to form a complete title for a control.

value.span: 一个字符串，充当控件副标题。

span.span: A string that serves as a subtitle for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性 （可选） 若要返回将追加到您的自定义的标准副标题字符串控件的标题。Use the property optionally to return a standard subtitle string that will be appended to your custom control's title. 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 如果你实现用户控件或自定义控件，若要提供默认值中的属性，将自动设置的 Web 部件控件将其附加到控件的值属性在运行时创建一个完整的标题。If you implement the property in a user control or custom control to provide a default value, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the control's property at run time to create a complete title.

summary.span: Gets or sets the title of a control.

span.span: Gets or sets the title of a control.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示部件控件的标题。

span.span: A string that represents the title of the part control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置部件控件的标题栏中的可见标题文本属性。The visible title text in a part control's title bar is set by the property. 如果未提供控件的标题的 Web 部件控件集自动计算要用作标题的默认字符串。If you do not supply a title for a control, the Web Parts control set automatically calculates a default string to use as a title. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 另外，还有可能提供追加到的标题字符串默认副标题。Also, it is possible to provide a default subtitle that is appended to the title string. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For details, see . 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何属性中的服务器控件以声明方式设置控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式在标签中显示其值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image used to represent a control in the control's own title bar.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image used to represent a control in the control's own title bar.

value.span: 一个表示图像的 URL 的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够将与图标关联控件。The property provides a way to associate an icon with a control. 该图标将显示在控件的标题栏中。The icon appears in the control's own title bar. 为了确保主题一致性，应用程序开发人员通常使此图标类似于表示 Web 部件控件的目录中的控件的图像 (中引用的映像属性)。For thematic consistency, application developers often make this icon similar to the image that represents the control in a catalog of Web Parts controls (the image referenced in the property). 它实现的 Web 部件控件集，一样属性可由最终用户更改控件的标题栏中显示的图标的图像进行个性化设置。As it is implemented in the Web Parts control set, the property can be personalized by end users to change the image or icon that appears in a control's title bar. 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何属性中的服务器控件以声明方式设置控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式在标签中显示其值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a URL to supplemental information about a control.

span.span: Gets or sets a URL to supplemental information about a control.

value.span: 有关详细信息表示 URL 的字符串控件。

span.span: A string that represents a URL to more information about a control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将分配到的 URL 时属性，该控件的标题将变为链接。When you assign a URL to the property, the title of the control becomes a link. 此属性提供便利的方法，让最终用户可以访问控件的相关的其他信息。This property provides a convenient way for end users to access additional information about a control. 其他信息可以包括版权数据、 联系人数据有关的控件，创建者或控件的用途的摘要详细信息。The additional information could include copyright data, contact data, details about the creator of the control, or a summary of the purpose of a control. 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 可以通过编程方式来以及对 Web 网页、 的声明性标记控件设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要提供默认值的属性，每次使用控件时，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何属性中的服务器控件以声明方式设置控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式在标签中显示其值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection Verbs { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection Verbs
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Verbs As WebPartVerbCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartVerbCollection ^ Verbs { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartVerbCollection ^ get(); };
member this.Verbs : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection

summary.span: Gets a collection of custom verbs associated with a control.

span.span: Gets a collection of custom verbs associated with a control.

value.span: A ，其中包含自定义与关联的对象控件。

span.span: A that contains custom objects associated with a control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 谓词派生自类，并提供用户界面 (UI) 操作，用户可对执行控件。Verbs derive from the class, and provide user interface (UI) actions that users can perform on a control. 通常情况下，在作为按钮、 链接或菜单项的用户界面中表示谓词。Usually, verbs are represented in the UI as buttons, links, or menu items. 有标准谓词用于打开、 关闭、 编辑和最小化控件与用于导出的定义控件或加载的帮助文件的其他谓词。There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file. 中不包括这些谓词集合，因为该集合包含仅自定义的谓词。These verbs are not included in the collection, because the collection contains only custom verbs. 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以访问的子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 如果子控件实现界面并因此重写其属性，控件使用的子控件的实现时属性调用上控件。If you child control implements the interface and thus overrides its property, the control uses the child control's implementation when the property is invoked on the control. 如果创建自定义谓词并将其添加到集合，然后就可以访问通过编程方式从谓词控件。When you create custom verbs and add them to the collection, you can then access the verbs programmatically from a control.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object WebBrowsableObject { get; }
.property instance object WebBrowsableObject
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property WebBrowsableObject As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ WebBrowsableObject { System::Object ^ get(); };
member this.WebBrowsableObject : obj

summary.span: Gets a reference to the child control, to enable the control to be edited by custom controls.

span.span: Gets a reference to the child control, to enable the control to be edited by custom controls.
An that consists of the child control of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果子控件实现接口，并重写其属性，当用户选择的控件的编辑，控件将调入子控制通过属性，并使用子控件的实现方法。If a child control implements the interface, and overrides its property, when a user selects the control for editing, the control will call into the child control through the property, and use the child control's implementation of the method. 此机制允许不是服务器或用户控件控制使用关联的自定义工作Web 部件应用程序中的控件。This mechanism allows a server or user control that is not a control to work with custom associated controls in a Web Parts application.

summary.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the control.
A that indicates the width of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性重写基属性，以便你可以获取或设置子控件上的宽度，就像它是真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can get or set the width on the child control as if it were a true control.
